FROM gcr.io/oss-fuzz-base/base-builder-python
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir hypothesis

RUN git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/Julian/jsonschema
WORKDIR $SRC/jsonschema

COPY build.sh $SRC/
